content.c_venueAddress: 2 Charing Cross Rd, Charing Cross, London WC2H 0HH
content.name: Instructions for a Teenage Armageddon

primaryPhoto.description:
Don’t miss INSTRUCTIONS FOR A TEENAGE ARMAGEDDON at the Garrick Theatre with performances running for a limited time this spring!
Bridgerton’s Charithra Chandran makes her West End debut in Rosie Day‘s, rollercoaster ride through youth, INSTRUCTIONS FOR A TEENAGE ARMAGEDDON. Whether you are a young person, know a young person, or simply were a young person once – it’s time to rip up the rule book and reconnect with your younger self.
“She was a 17 year old girl, the only God she believed in was Taylor Swift”.
Book your INSTRUCTIONS FOR A TEENAGE ARMAGEDDON tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
